text: Niscaya tomaloke amara ocarata nihsanga arasthata ahicha, yidarae ami tomalokaka prathamabara srsti karaichilo, arau ami tomalokaka yi pradana karaichilo seya tomaloke nijara pichaphale erai thai ahicha. Tomaloke yisakalaka tomalokara babe (allahara lagata) ansi buli bharaichila, se'i chuparaichakarai bilako dekhuna tomalokara lagata na'i. Tomalokara majara samparka niscaya bicchinna haiche arau tomaloke yito dharana karaichila se'ito'o tomalokara paraa heraa'i gaiche
